page.title: 15THE GATTY FAMILY
page.content: Margaret Gatty was a daughter of DR.Alexander John Scott,chaplain to Nelson on the Victory in 1839.She married Alfred Gatty and came with her husband to Ecclesfield vicarage(now demolished)where she spent the rest of her life bringing up her eight surviving children,helping her husband in the Parish,writing her many books and carrying out scientific work. Her first book was written by her and her husband it was a biography of her father ,published in 1842 and it was not untill 1851 that she published her first book for children(The Fairy Godmothers)shortly after she began work on parables of Nature Moral tales with a background of nature a natural history.
